content.question: Which of the following economic changes occurred during Reaganâ€™s administrations?

choices.label: A growth in service sector employment coupled with a decline in manufacturing
A rapid incorporation of computer technology and the Internet in business
A reduction in defense spending as the Cold War came to an end
A consistent increase in real wages for the working and middle class

content.answer: A growth in service sector employment coupled with a decline in manufacturing

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
